Easy, my friend! Prepare your broiler pan lined with tin foil, set your broiler to \"low\", drizzle your pork chops with EVOO, salt and Pepper and any other seasoning you would like. Place broiler pan under Heat, about 4-5\" below the Heat element. Now, Depending on the thickness of your Pork Chops or if they are \"bone in\" will vary with your cooking times. So, without that added information, I have to let you go here. I may help with the Thicknesses though: Cooked Medium-Med-Rare, and left to set out for 10 minutes. 1/2 inch: 2-3 minutes, each side 1\": 4 minutes, each side 1 1/2 -2 \": 5-6 minutes, each side
Good Choice for your protein and dinner! Pork Rules!
